          Genre       :    Action | Romance    
                                               
                                               
                                               
 Ek Tha Tiger is a romantic thriller which     
 tells the story of a Trinity College scientist
 suspected of selling missile technology       
 secrets to Pakistan. The Indian government    
 sends a secret agent, codenamed Tiger , to    
 find out about the professor's activities.    
 Tiger falls in love with the professor's      
 caretaker Zoya who is studying at a fictional 
 dance academy located at TCD, and together    
 they embark on a roller-coaster journey that  
 takes them from Dublin to Istanbul then to    
 Kazakhstan and Chile.
